snippet: Gov. Chris Christie embraces the notion that transparency is for squares and deploys his moves with muscular artistry.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column contends that New Jersey Gov Chris Christie embraces notion that transparency is for squares, and deploys political moves with muscular artistry; says host of circumstantial evidence and plain common sense suggests that Christie's hand was behind closure of Fort Lee, NJ, roadways to George Washington Bridge in September after city's mayor refused to endorse Christie's re-election.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie embraces the notion that transparency is for squares and deploys his moves with muscular artistry.

headline.main: Cornered by Accusations, Christie Parries With Jokes and Stonewalls With Snarls
headline.print_headline: Cornered by Accusations, Christie Parries With Jokes and Stonewalls With Snarls

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
